title: Horrible inconsistency with Varus' lore
body:
[](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/16/Varus_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170615204206)
He's no longer straight like an arrow!

Goddamnit riot!

replies.body: {{champion:110}} beware a  meme with nothing to lose
Holy shit his quotes are fucking worthless now
He's up high on a VO update chart right next to Miss Fortune.

{{champion:53}} {{champion:61}} 
And waaaaaaaaaay behind those 2.

Please update Orianna Riot :( 
I don't want to listen to bloodthirsty quotes anymore.

I miss some of the old lore, In my opinion {{champion:28}}  should have stayed as the most expensive assassin in Runeterra, Riot did alright by most of the other champs they've updated. {{champion:110}} makes me want to cry, I mean the lore for some of the champs was amazing and made me like them that much more, but please RIOT stop doing 180's on champs like {{champion:110}} and {{champion:28}}, it really subtracts on the champ for players like me that have been around for a few years, why not dig into the vaults of unreleased or uncompleted champs that are squirreled away and finish them with the new lore.
I don't know... Jhin covers the International Assassin trope far better than Eve could ever hope to.

Jhin is too linear.
Has too simple tactics.
Is also very predictable.
Not a good assassin.

You could spot JHIN just about anywhere.
You only see him wearing his mask.  He could take it off and blend in with a crowd.
Ya know we've never seen jhin and batman in the same place......

"Argh... you're no fun, Bats!"

"Good work, Batman. We'll take it from here with this looney freak. Anything else we can do?"

"No, but I appreciate it, Jim. I have somewhere else to be."

##*Batman Jumps into the Batmobile and drives*

"Master Bruce, will you be calling it a night? It's almost morning."

"Not yet, Alfred. I have another assignment."

"Assignment, sir...?"

"Yes. But I'll need to cut comms for now. See you on the other side."

"Alright, well I wish you the best Mast-"

##*Pulls on Jhin mask*

{{champion:202}} "Watch out Gotham,  the performer is about to take center-stage!" 

##*Laughs maniacally*
The giant gun is probably hard to hide

Except it is a kinda small pistol and a cane.
Not hard to hide at all.
What about the thing on his shoulder for his ult?
Hunchback, hence why he needs a cane.
underrated and unappreciated post
A true artist always is.
Came back to upvote

Don't you know? Jhin got around travelling for years....because he also happens to be a talented circus artist that does disguises, makeup and acrobatics O_O

Kinda like a clown but more towards the bard direction where he just dresses fancily. 

And in story wise his guns have massive range because he uses some kinda magic alternative to boost the range outrageously, and it works on his rifle too.

And he transports them around dismantled around with the rest of the stuff used for his circus performances.


It took.....i think it was 2 years? For Shen, Zed, and their teacher from start to finish to actually track him down and identify him.

The top 3 ninja's with an entire order under them, could not find a single mass murderer for two years despite that he often stopped and worked for hours at each scene of his "art".


Heck they even got traumatized from seeing it so much, that is partially the reason Zed fell out with his master in the new lore.


Going by all this Jhin is pretty damn terrifying.
pfft jhin doesn't make dildo jokes about items though...

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art

Head over there.
But you seemed lonely over here.
H...How do you know? T^T
Its okay... shhhh

Eve's lore is better now than it ever was.
She was never a premiere assassin, her color text that puts her in Zaun for one assassination job was just a placeholder for her eventual rework and Riot has said that it may not hold true when her rework comes along.

And i'm an Eve main.
Old Eve had her charms but her character was just bland.

Did...did you read her old lore from when she was Agony's embrace? It specifically said "Swift and lethal, Evelynn is one of the most deadly - and expensive - assassins in all of Runeterra. Able to merge with the shadows at will, she patiently stalks her ..."
How did this become a weird conglomeration of Jhin being batman.. actually how did Jhin even get involved here? Its like a lurking Jhin fandom was waiting for an opening here.
Yeah, but he sure is as HARD as an arrow ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Well, I guess you're half-right. His Q is about the straightest thing about him currently, and that's okay.

So now they just need to make his E shoot a rainbow and the tendrils of his ult be spiraling rainbows.

(It's just a joke)
Make his Q work like Diana Q rito

Perfect fix.

Rito pls, the straightest thing about Varus should be his bow.
Thank you for the laugh <3 quality joke.
So uh how does heartseeker varus work now?
And is it foursome
Um... since when were his arrows straight? They're literally flailing tendrils.

The Joke











Your head.

>
> The Joke
> 
> Your head.

Apparently my point went over yours, too.

My point is your joke is wrong - he's always been bent.
If Ionia's law is similar to that of early 20th century Britain, the Darkin isn't the only person that will get imprisoned :^)

Well he is 1/3 straight. It's just his other 2/3's that are gay for each other.

######This has to be an accepted sexual orientation on some part of the internet. Can someone look for it on one of those charts with the alien symbols on it?
Time flies like an arrow, fruit flys like banana {{champion:26}}

lol. Ehh... I can't say I'm a fan.  Varus did kinda seem like the Good guy using evil for good. Kayne's the bad guy using evil for bad, Aatrox is epitome of those two, and as a full darkin Shouldn't he FEEL stronger (Aatrox)
Malicious you are beacon of gleaming light... metal? In a world of bad... memes?
Well played {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Well.. he atcually is... his "fuel" isn't thought :P
Kalista's spear and W is proof that she is a trap
so let me get this riot, you make lux throw away the lux+ez ship just so zoe can have it back up, just so taric+ezreal cant happen to make this?
